ChecklistItems.item: Coordinate with vendor for furniture delivery schedules.
ChecklistItems.notes: Confirm delivery dates and times to avoid conflicts.

ChecklistItems.item: Check lead times for ordered furniture.
ChecklistItems.notes: Ensure all items will arrive on schedule.

ChecklistItems.item: Inspect delivered furniture for quality and accuracy.
ChecklistItems.notes: Report any discrepancies or damages immediately.
Ensure proper assembly and placement according to layout plan.

ChecklistItems.item: Finalize and approve the furniture layout.
ChecklistItems.notes: Get approval from all stakeholders before completing the project.
